## Installation

### New Users

1. Download `mailiam-wordpress.zip` below
2. In WordPress: Plugins → Add New → Upload Plugin
3. Upload the ZIP file and activate
4. Configure at Settings → Mailiam

[Full installation guide](https://github.com/mailiam/wordpress-plugin#installation)

### Existing Users

WordPress will notify you about this update automatically. Click "Update Now" in your WordPress admin.

## Requirements

- WordPress 5.0+
- PHP 7.4+
- Mailiam account ([sign up](https://mailiam.io))
